paul.dominic@... wrote:

> Hai
> 
>          In JUnit Script , I am passing all the input data (positive set of
> data and negative set of data) through XML. Finally i am generating Report
> through Ant.  This report gives test case name,  status and type. I want to
> add one more field called input data inbetween name and status field. How to
> implement this.  Anybody knows how to modify the report structure please
> mail me.

You can override getName() in your subclass of TestCase to include 
information about your input data. This might be the easiest modification.

By the way: please change the subject line when you start a new thread 
by asking a new question. It is disappointing to read a message and find 
out it is /not/ more information about a question /you/ have asked.

Take care.
--
